001// SPDX-License-Identifier: GPL-3.0-or-later
002
003package es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.corenlpentityextraction.xml.definition;
004
005import javax.xml.bind.annotation.XmlRootElement;
006
007import edu.stanford.nlp.io.IOUtils;
008import edu.stanford.nlp.patterns.GetPatternsFromDataMultiClass;
009import edu.stanford.nlp.pipeline.NERCombinerAnnotator;
010import edu.stanford.nlp.pipeline.TokensRegexNERAnnotator;
011import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.xml.definition.AbstractProcessingStepParameter;
012
013/**
014 * Parameter for specifying the properties to pass to
015 * {@link GetPatternsFromDataMultiClass}. The keys of the properties file are
016 * not that well documented, and the class code itself is a poorly commented,
017 * hard to read god class with more than 3600 lines of code, but there are
018 * examples included with the CoreNLP distribution.
019 *
020 * <p>
021 * Some properties should not be included in a custom properties file, either
022 * because they are generated or assumed to have a fixed value. These properties
023 * are:
024 * </p>
025 * <ul>
026 * <li>{@code file} (automatically set to the temporary document file)</li>
027 * <li>{@code fileFormat} (automatically set to {@code ser} for efficiency)</li>
028 * <li>{@code useTargetNERRestriction} (assumed to be {@code true})</li>
029 * <li>{@code useTargetParserParentRestriction} (assumed to be
030 * {@code false})</li>
031 * <li>{@code seedWordsFiles} (deduced from
032 * {@link SeedWordsDirectoryProcessingStepParameter})</li>
033 * <li>{@code patternType} (assumed to be "SURFACE")</li>
034 * <li>{@code preserveSentenceSequence} (assumed to be {@code false})</li>
035 * <li>{@code savePatternsWordsDir} (assumed to be {@code true})</li>
036 * <li>{@code loadSavedPatternsWordsDir} (automatically set to {@code true} or
037 * {@code false})</li>
038 * <li>{@code patternsWordsDir} (automatically set to the temporary model
039 * folder)</li>
040 * <li>{@code computeAllPatterns} (should be {@code true} for consistency)</li>
041 * <li>{@code identifier} (assumed to be {@code textproc})</li>
042 * <li>{@code outDir} (automatically set to the appropriate temporary
043 * folder)</li>
044 * </ul>
045 * <p>
046 * Additionally, the following properties are added:
047 * </p>
048 * <ul>
049 * <li>{@code nerModelPaths}: comma-separated list of URL or file paths to the
050 * NER model to use for {@link NERCombinerAnnotator}. See
051 * {@link IOUtils#getInputStreamFromURLOrClasspathOrFileSystem(String)}.</li>
052 * <li>{@code fineGrainedRegexnerMapping}: the value to pass to the
053 * {@code mapping} property of {@link TokensRegexNERAnnotator} when
054 * instantiating a {@link NERCombinerAnnotator}. If not provided, a default
055 * value will be used.</li>
056 * <li>{@code applyFineGrainedRegexner}: the value to pass to the
057 * {@code ner.applyFineGrained} property of {@link NERCombinerAnnotator} when
058 * instantiating it. If not provided, a default value will be used.</li>
059 * </ul>
060 * <p>
061 * See the bundled default properties file and the see also section for more
062 * details.
063 * </p>
064 *
065 * @author Alejandro González García
066 * @see <a href=
067 *      "https://nlp.stanford.edu/nlp/javadoc/javanlp/edu/stanford/nlp/patterns/GetPatternsFromDataMultiClass.html">https://nlp.stanford.edu/nlp/javadoc/javanlp/edu/stanford/nlp/patterns/GetPatternsFromDataMultiClass.html</a>,
068 *      <a href=
069 *      "https://nlp.stanford.edu/software/patternslearning.html">https://nlp.stanford.edu/software/patternslearning.html</a>
070 *      <a href=
071 *      "https://github.com/stanfordnlp/CoreNLP/blob/master/data/edu/stanford/nlp/patterns/surface/example.properties">https://github.com/stanfordnlp/CoreNLP/blob/master/data/edu/stanford/nlp/patterns/surface/example.properties</a>,
072 *      <a href=
073 *      "https://github.com/stanfordnlp/CoreNLP/blob/master/src/edu/stanford/nlp/patterns/GetPatternsFromDataMultiClass.java#L3005">https://github.com/stanfordnlp/CoreNLP/blob/master/src/edu/stanford/nlp/patterns/GetPatternsFromDataMultiClass.java#L3005</a>
074 */
075@XmlRootElement(name = "spiedProperties")
076public final class PropertiesFileProcessingStepParameter extends AbstractProcessingStepParameter {}
